sections.heading: Repealed.Section 30-5-2 - Repealed.Section 30-5-3 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 40A-5-1, enacted by Laws 1969, ch. 67, § 1; 1978 Comp., § 30-5-1, repealed by Laws 2021, ch. 2, § 1.

Repeals.— Laws 2021, ch. 2, § 1 repealed 30-5-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1969, ch. 67, § 1, relating to definitions, effective June 18, 2021. For provisions of former section,seethe 2020 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 40A-5-2, enacted by Laws 1969, ch. 67, § 2; 1978 Comp., § 30-5-2, repealed by Laws 2021, ch. 2, § 1.

Repeals.— Laws 2021, ch. 2, § 1 repealed 30-5-2 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1969, ch. 67, § 2, relating to persons and institutions exempt, effective June 18, 2021. For provisions of former section,seethe 2020 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 40A-5-3, enacted by Laws 1969, ch. 67, § 3; 1978 Comp., § 30-5-3, repealed by Laws 2021, ch. 2, § 1.

Repeals.— Laws 2021, ch. 2, § 1 repealed 30-5-3 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1969, ch. 67, § 3, relating to criminal abortion, effective June 18, 2021. For provisions of former section,seethe 2020 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
